title: Engineering Calculator
metaTitle: Free Engineering Calculator - Advanced Math Functions | Online Tools
metaDescription: Free online engineering calculator with trigonometry, logarithms, exponentials, and statistics. Advanced math calculator with calculation history. Perfect for students and engineers.

header.title: Engineering Calculator

privateSecure.title: 100% Private & Secure
privateSecure.description: All calculations are processed locally in your browser. No data is sent to any server, ensuring complete privacy.

advancedFunctions.title: Advanced Functions
advancedFunctions.description: Full scientific calculator with trigonometry, logarithms, exponentials, statistics, and complex mathematical operations.

calculationHistory.title: Calculation History
calculationHistory.description: Keep track of all your calculations with a detailed history panel. Quickly reuse previous calculations.

highPrecision.title: High Precision
highPrecision.description: Accurate calculations with support for complex equations, matrices, and statistical functions.

keyboardSupport.title: Keyboard Support
keyboardSupport.description: Full keyboard support for faster input. Use your keyboard for numbers, operators, and functions.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No registration required. Use all advanced engineering calculator features completely free with unlimited calculations.
